activity.sourceInvalidCombination: The activity's JSON can only have one of the following keys 'items', 'random' or 'adaptive'.
activity.sourceInvalidRandomItems: Items in random groups are not allowed to specify organisation_id
activity.sourceMissingAdaptiveError: Configuration for adaptive in the source has been removed or misspelled. Cancel to fix any errors. OK will delete existing adaptive configurations for this activity.
activity.sourceRenderingTypeError: Rendering type has to be 'assess' or 'inline'.
activity.restrictedOrMissingItems: This activity contains restricted or missing items. The information in those items is not available or shown in the preview.

randomActivity.shuffleItemsCheckboxHelperText: The order of items in this group will be shuffled

itemGroup.emptyMessage: Start by finding items to add here
itemGroup.countExceededInfoMessage: %number% items in this group (max. count of %max_number% exceeded!)
itemGroup.infoMessageIconTooltipText: It is recommended to have at least twice the number of items in an item group (than items to deliver) to reduce chances of repeated content in an assessment.
itemGroup.infoMessageIconTooltipTextLimitReached: The maximum number of items allowed in a group have been reached. To change items, first delete items from the group, and then add new items via Find items.

validationError.invalidDeliverValueLabel: Number of items to deliver cannot exceed the number of items in this group
validationError.emptyLabel: Group labels must not be empty

branchingActivity.emptyState: Start by adding items to the tray on the right, then move items to this canvas
branchingActivity.globalScoreNodeTooltip: A score calculation will take place to determine the next step
branchingActivity.deleteConfirmationMessage:
Removing step (%stepLabel%) will remove all connections attached to this step, and other paired connections will be replaced with the basic branching type.

This item will be moved back to item tray.

Are you sure you want to remove this step?

logicPanel.pendingChangesText:
Logic changes have not been applied.

Would you like to apply changes you have made?
logicPanel.nameValidationError: Step ID name must be unique. Please update and retry.
logicPanel.provideOneValidationError: Provide at least one next step
logicPanel.requiredFieldValidationError: Please fill in each required field

branchingActivity.itemPickerMultiIbkWarningMessage: The item bank selection dropdown is not shown as items from multiple item banks or item pools are not supported by adaptive branching activities.
branchingActivity.previewWarning: Only step boxes with branching logic connections are displayed.
branchingActivity.canvasRegionInstructions: Next is the canvas for the branching activity. Use tabbing controls for canvas navigation. When tabbing through, all edges are visited first, followed by all nodes. When a node is focused, press space to begin moving it, use the arrow keys to move, and press escape to deselect. When focused on the connection button, press enter to start connection mode, tab to the desired node, and press enter again to create the connection.
branchingActivity.nodeConnected: Unable to add more logic connections, node is already connected to %childNodes%
branchingActivity.nodeOneConnection: Add logic connection, node is already connected to %childNode%
branchingActivity.nodeNoConnections: Add logic connection, node currently has no connections

validation.stepAlreadyVisited: Step %stepID% already visited - cannot be linked back to
validation.stepDoesNotExist: Step %stepID% does not exist, but is referenced by %parentStepID%
validation.stepNotReferenced: All step boxes in the canvas must have branching logic connections.
validation.inaccessibleSteps: Not all steps are accessible from root step. Inaccessible steps: %steps%
validation.invalidGlobalScoreStep: Global-score steps must have a 'percentage', '>=', and '<' properties.
validation.invalidType: The adaptive 'type' property must be set to 'itembranching'.
validation.missingAdaptive: The adaptive configuration must start with an 'adaptive' property.
validation.missingID: A step is missing an 'id' property.
validation.missingReference: A step is missing a 'reference' property.
validation.missingNext: A step is missing a 'next' property.
validation.invalidNext: Decision steps with a 'next' object must have 'correct' and 'incorrect' properties.
validation.errorInformation:
To save published branching activity:

There must be no items left in the item tray, all step boxes in the canvas must have branching logic connections and the branching type and next step must be specified, including marking it the end of assessment.

Or, if you would like to save this branching activity in its current state, unpublish the activity.
validation.itemsInTrayError: Unable to save in published state, items in tray
validation.itemPickerWarning: Unable to save, please go back to the activity for more information
validation.cyclicSteps: There are cyclic steps in the branching activity: %steps%

customPoints.tooltip: Override the points assigned to individual questions within the activity. Note when enabled, changes to item level points will not affect the overall activity points.

Launch the administration panel during an assessment via keyboard: (Windows) control+shift+m (Apple Mac) ^+⇧+m

A password is required to access the administration panel. Set the password and generate a security hash.
assess.adminPasswordError: Password field can not be empty and its value needs to be hashed.
assess.distractorRationaleResponseLevel: Show Distractor Rationale per response (if available)
assess.fontSizeDescription: Applies a standard font size across the content when using default text styles.

itemDuplicate.title: Duplicate item
itemDuplicate.warningMessage: This item contains passage(s) which would be shared with the duplicated item.
itemDuplicate.optionMessage: This item contains passage(s) which would be shared with the duplicated item. Would you like to duplicate the passage(s)?

csvColumnsUnaligned: All CSV rows require the same number of columns
descriptionDescription: Describe the item for other authors. Max 250 characters.

duplicateActivity.mainMessage: Activity and settings will be duplicated. Items will be shared with the new activity.
duplicateActivity.multiIbkWarning: You cannot make new copies of the items within this activity as some originate from external item banks.
duplicateActivity.shallowMessage: Items in the activity will not be duplicated.
duplicateActivity.deepMessage1: By default, all items will be shared in the new activity.
duplicateActivity.deepMessage2: If new copies are required, please check the box below.
duplicateActivity.deepMessage3: Creating new copies may take several minutes.
duplicateActivity.duplicateSharedPassages: Create new copies of passages within items
duplicateActivity.itemsAndWidgets: Create new copies of all items
duplicateActivity.successMessage: Start editing the new activity below.
duplicateActivity.warning: Your current changes are not saved and will not be applied if you make a deep copy of the activity. Do you want to continue with duplication?
duplicateActivity.referenceMessage: The new activity reference will be:
duplicateActivity.newActivityWarning: You cannot duplicate an unsaved new activity. Please save the activity and try again.
duplicateActivity.shallowDuplicateSuccessMessage: Your activity has been successfully duplicated. You can begin editing the duplicated activity below (click to dismiss).
duplicateActivity.shallowDuplicateMissingItemsError: You are on the duplicated activity which failed to save because it contains missing items. The information in those items is not available or shown in the preview. Remove or replace the missing items to save this duplicated activity.
duplicateActivity.shallowDuplicateDefaultError: You are on the duplicated activity which failed to save because of an unknown error. Please try to save this duplicated activity again.
duplicateActivity.errorMessage: There was an error in duplicating the activity. Try again?

editor.activityCountWarning: Warning: This item is used in activities. Any changes will impact all activities that use this item.

emptyActivityMessage: This activity is empty, please add items.

enableLeftPartialRefMatchText: Enabling reference search without using the beginning of the reference may cause search performance issues. If you encounter issues, try using multiple search criteria to improve performance.

itemGroupListEmptyState: Start by creating an item group

itemList.errorState: Search failed. Try using multiple search criteria to improve search performance.

linkedStandardsModal.title: Standards (%numStandards%)
linkedStandardsModal.emptyDescription: There are no Standards linked to this item.

mathGen.introHeading: Create a Math Question Generator Expression
mathGen.introDescription:
Define a set of parameters and then use those parameters to generate multiple variations of a %questiontype% question.
The learner will see one randomly selected question from the generated set.
mathGen.summary: There are %possibilities% for this item. Use the edit button to change the Math Question Generator Expression settings.
mathGen.decimalTooltip: Select the number of significant decimal places
mathGen.thousandsTooltip: Select a thousands separator. Options are: dot or comma
mathGen.disabledTableEditTopText: This data table cannot be edited from here as the Math Question Generator has created it.
mathGen.disabledTableEditBottomText: If you need to make changes, go back and edit the Math Question Generator question type in this item.
mathGen.errorValidationEmpty: Invalid expression! The criteria you have set does not return valid results. Please edit your expression or question.
mathGen.errorValidationServerError: There's been a problem with your request. Please try again later.
mathGen.errorGenerateEmpty: Could not generate data. Please edit your expression or question.
mathGen.errorGenerateServerError: There's been a problem with your request. Please try again later.
mathGen.parametersHeading: Create parameters and set their values
mathGen.parametersInstructions: There are two ways to define the parameter values, either as a list or a range. The values can either be integers or decimal values up to three decimal places.
mathGen.parametersInstructionsList: Value type 'List' — Enter the values you wish to use, separated with a comma.
mathGen.parametersInstructionsRange: Value type 'Range' — Set the minimum, maximum, and step for the range. The step determines the increment between each value.
mathGen.parameterListEdit: Edit parameter list using comma separated values
mathGen.expressionHeading: Create the correct answer with the parameter(s)
mathGen.expressionInstructions:
Use the keypad to input an expression that is equivalent to the correct answer to the question.
Use the parameter dropdown selector %parameterIcon% in the keypad to insert your parameter(s).
mathGen.questionInstructions: Write out your question stem in the field below. Click the %expressionIcon% button to add your expression in the content or insert your parameter(s) using the %parameterIcon% dropdown selector in the toolbar.

validation.heading: Select the correct answer format(s)
validation.instructions: Select all of the correct answer formats that you would like to accept from the list of possible solutions.
validation.optionsInstructions: Use these options to refine your accepted response.

mathGen.generateRegenerateWarning: This will overwrite existing content for this item. Are you sure you want to continue?
mathGen.generateInstructions: A maximum of %possibilityCount% questions will be returned. After generating, you can refine the results by removing unwanted variations.
mathGen.generateRefineInstructions: Refine the results by removing unwanted variations.
mathGen.unsavedChangesConfirmation:
You have unsaved changes.
Are you sure you want to return to the question edit view?

formValidation.parameterMinInvalidValue: Min value should be a valid number

formValidation.parameterMinMaxValue: Min value should not be more than %value%

formValidation.parameterNameMinLength: Name should have at least %value% character(s)
formValidation.parameterNameMaxLength: Name should not be longer than %value% character(s)
formValidation.parameterNamePattern: Name should only contain letters a-z or A-Z
formValidation.parameterStepInvalidValue: Step value should be a valid number
formValidation.parameterStepMinValue: Step value should not be less than %value%
formValidation.parameterListFormat: The range should only contain numbers (to 3 decimal places maximum) and commas without spaces
formValidation.parameterMinPermutations: Permutations should not be less than %value%
formValidation.parameterMaxPermutations: Permutations should not be more than %value%
formValidation.expressionParametersRequired: Expression should have at least %value% parameter(s)
formValidation.questionResponseExceeded: Question should not contain more than %value% response(s)
formValidation.validationDataFormatRequired: You need to select at least %value% answer format(s)
formValidation.validationDataScoreMinValue: Score should not be less than %value%
formValidation.dataSeparatorValue: The separators for decimal and thousand positions cannot both use the %value% character
